# ğŸ• Schnauzer Desktop Pet

Your adorable desktop companion!

## How to Run

1. **Double-click** `SchnauzerPet.exe`
2. Click "Launch Schnauzer Pet" in the window that appears
3. Enjoy your new desktop friend! ğŸ‰

## What Can It Do?

- **Click the dog** to see tricks (backflip, sit, poop)
- **Right-click the dog** to add more dogs or edit zones
- **Press ESC** on the dog to close it

## Controls

From the launcher window:
- ğŸš€ Launch Schnauzer Pet - Start your first dog
- â• Add Another Dog - Get more dogs
- ğŸ“ Edit Walking Zones - Choose where dogs can walk

## Tips

ğŸ’¡ You can have multiple dogs running at once!
ğŸ’¡ Use the zone editor to control where dogs appear
ğŸ’¡ Dogs will randomly walk, sit, and do tricks
